summary.span: 描述整数矩形的宽度、高度和位置。

span.span: Describes the width, height, and location of an integer rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *X**X* 矩形左上角的 x 坐标。The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle. *是**Y* 矩形左上角的 y 坐标。The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle. Width *Width* 矩形的宽度。The width of the rectangle. Height *Height* 矩形的高度。The height of the rectangle. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 你还可以使用空格而不是逗号来分隔值。You can also use white space instead of commas to delimit values. 空格还可用于以逗号分隔的值集。White space can also be used with a comma delimited value set.
